title: Baran typeface (modern serif)
content:
I want to show my latest serif typeface. A lot of corrections still need to be done but that's one of the reasons why I'm posting this.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Baran v23 specimen.pdf](http://web.archive.org/web/20150325072520/http:/typophile.com/files/Baran%20v23%20specimen.pdf) | 23.73 KB |
author: Martin Silvertant
